title: Sasha Alexander
summary: Sasha Alexander (born Suzana Drobnjakovic Serbian Cyrillic: Сузана Дробњаковић on May 17, 1973) is an American actress and TV director. She played Gretchen Witter in Dawson's Creek and has acted in films including Yes Man (2008) and He's Just Not That Into You (2009). Alexander played Caitlin Todd for the first two seasons of NCIS (2003–2005). From July 2010 through September 2016, Alexander starred as Maura Isles in the TNT series Rizzoli & Isles and was a regular in Season 5 and 6 of Shameless in 2015-2016.
